sentence: Arizona Congressman Paul Gosar, a Republican from Prescott, gave a brief video address, a far cry from last year, when he was the featured speaker.
author: Jim Small
title: Arizona Republican said white nationalists are ‘patriots’ and called for hanging political enemies

sentence: “Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, I don’t know them,” Mr. Romney, Utah Republican, told CNN’s “State of the Union.” “I’m reminded of the old line from the Butch Cassidy and Sundance Kid movie, where one character says, ‘Morons, I have morons on my team.’” “I would think that anybody that would sit down with a white nationalist and speak at their conference would certainly be missing a few IQ points,” he said.
author: Tom Howell Jr.
title: Sen. Mitt Romney rips ‘morons’ in GOP after lawmakers address White nationalist conference

sentence: Arizona Congressman Paul Gosar, a Republican from Prescott, gave a brief video address, a far cry from last year, when he was the featured speaker.
author: Jim Small
title: Az's Wendy Rogers said white nationalists are 'patriots' & called for hanging political enemies

sentence: "As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling," Cheney said in a tweet.
author: Blarp Blog
title: Romney on Greene, Gosar: 'I have morons on my team'
